channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose in 'Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger', then in 'Pups Save A Royal Painting', Sweetie tries to replace a painting of the Princess. (S8, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Travelling Travis finds a mysterious creature in troublein 'Pups Save a Humsquatch', and in 'Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc', a robo-toy causes mayhem, but Ryder knows just who to call! (S6, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Baby Box's Meow-Seum Day!: Gabby and Pandy help the Gabby Cats create unique pieces of artwork in preparation for Baby Box's highly anticipated Meow-seum Day! (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Secrets; The Playgroup: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Pig's Chickens; Champion Daddy Pig: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Flying Vet; The Zoo: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Long Grass: Daddy Pig has not cut the lawn for ages and the grass has grown very long.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Kylie Kangaroo: Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit look for a mysterious bird in 'The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs', then 'The Missing Mole Rat Princess', the duo tracks down a royal mole rat who left her underground palace. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Justa is still searching for his calling in 'The Talented Justa Smurf', then in 'Smurf, Yes Smurf!', Brainy uses a potion to finally get the Village to obey his every whim. (S2, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Grumples make 'Troll Jelly', and then in 'Catch That Kitty', Dora recovers the artifact El Gatito Magico. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rubble's cousin visits Adventure Bay in 'Charger Visits the Pups', and then in 'Pups Save a Shiny Ride', Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a contest. (S9, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger disguises himself to steal a purple pearl in 'Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger', then in 'Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patroller', Moby swipes the Whale Patroller - and the Pups' vehicles! (S9, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help the Mayor go skydiving in 'The Crew Builds An Indoor Skydiving Centre', then in 'The Crew Builds A Roller Rink', Wheeler and Truffles try some new wheels. (S2, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Paramedic Power: When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day! (S7, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Game Show: It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! CatRat leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Baby Dragon: The children have adopted a new pet - a dragon named Dave.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit look for a mysterious bird in 'The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs', then 'The Missing Mole Rat Princess', the duo tracks down a royal mole rat who left her underground palace. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Abuela win the Great Abuela Cook-off in 'The Great Abuela Cookoff', and in 'Missing Map', Dora finds Map after a game of Hide-and-Seek. (S2, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Al's animals go missing when 'Pups Save a Sleepover', and then in 'Pups Save the Carnival', Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival and the prizes have gone missing too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time. (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party: At Chloe's party, the children and grownups struggle to finish the obstacle course to reach the prize. George is the last to try and finds the birthday cake! (S7, ep 27).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Competition; Adventure Caravan: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.
